-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Compile the functional logic language Curry to several
intermediate formats
--   
--   The Curry Frontend consists of the executable program <a>cymake</a>.
--   It is used by various backends to compile Curry programs to an
--   internal representation. The code is a stripped-down version of an
--   early version of the Muenster Curry Compiler
--   (<a>http://danae.uni-muenster.de/~lux/curry/</a>)
@package curry-frontend
@version 0.2.12

module Curry.Files.CymakePath

-- | Retrieve the location of the cymake executable
getCymake :: IO String

-- | Retrieve the version number of cymake
cymakeVersion :: String
